page.title: 10A village school secretary
page.content: The school secretary has lived here for 58 years.Her grandparents lived here from 1875 and then her father and mother.One of the things she does not like is that there is very few children actually living in Hankham and that many of thw cttages have been bought by retired people and made into a larger house.Her own hose is 80 years old and as there is no village shop she has to go to Langley once a week.Her hobbies include,cooking,sewing,knitting,garden ing and visiting people especially time spent with her grandchildren .She works at hankham school, which her father attended as a pupil as well as her self,as an ancillary and as a secretary she has been there for 25 years.
